name: Vortex Shield
effect: Upon activating the ability block all damage until you deactivated it. Should you take damage while the system is active, do not reduce your hp. Instead reduce the shield counter by one for each attack. When deactivating the Shield pick a target within RANGE: 10, deal 2 Kinetic damage for each captured attack. If your counter runs out you must pick a target within line of sight or all shots will miss. Add one to your counter for every turn the shield is deactivated.
description: Absorb incoming fire and redirect it back at the enemy.

name: Electric Smoke
effect: While within the smoke all titans gain -5 Difficulty to hit anything. Double damage from energy weapons after rolling damage, this only affects targets within the smoke.
description: Obscure vision and deal light damage.

name: Enhanced Autoloader
effect: Ignore Weapons with the (LOADING) and (ORDINANCE) tags.
description: This advanced autoload mechanism replenishes your Titan Ordnance faster, making your Titan's Ordnance available more frequently.

name: Dash Jets
effect: 1 per round you may dash to avoid the attack. After the attack roll has been made, roll against their attack. If its an area or line attack and you beat it then you take half damage anything else you beat it then you ignore the damage. If you fail then you take normal damage.
description: Adds dash jets to react to incoming attacks and dodge out of the way.
